attributes.action: change the laws on punishment for murderers.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: All murderers to be imprisoned for the rest of their natural life - they only leave prison in a coffin.

rejection.details: Your petition is very similar to this one http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/Life-behind-bars/ which runs until 23 April 2009.
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
